  "description": "Origin Tech Group is a leading Agri-Tech and food systems company based in Lagos, Nigeria, with a strong presence across four continents. The company is innovation-driven, focused on solving agricultural and infrastructure challenges in Africa through advanced technology and engineering solution.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Oregun, Ikeja - Lagos

Job Summary


	We are looking for a talented and detail-oriented Graphics Designer to create visually compelling designs that communicate our brand message across various platforms.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio, a keen eye for aesthetics, and the ability to transform ideas into impactful visual content.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and produce high-quality graphics for digital and print media including social media posts, brochures, banners, presentations, and advertisements.
	Collaborate with marketing, communications, and product teams to develop creative concepts and campaigns.
	Ensure brand consistency across all design outputs.
	Prepare final artwork for production and liaise with printers and vendors as needed.
	Stay updated on design trends and tools to continuously improve creative output.
	Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
	Edit and retouch images as required.


Qualifications &amp; Skills


	HND / BSc Degree in Fine Arts, or related fields
	2 - 4 years of professional design experience.
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and other design tools.
	Strong portfolio showcasing creative and technical design skills.
	Excellent attention to detail and visual storytelling ability.
	Good communication and time management skills.
	Knowledge of basic animation or video editing tools (e.g., After Effects, Premiere Pro) is a plus.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary (N150,000 monthly)&nbsp;and benefits.
	Creative and collaborative work environment.
	Opportunities for professional growth and development.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hrbp@oawng.com&nbsp;using&nbsp; &quot;Graphics Designer&quot; as the subject of the email.",

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier

Job Location:&nbsp;Enugu&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Manufacturing / FMCG
Work Schedule:Monday - Friday: 8:00am &ndash; 6:00pm, Saturday: 8:00am &ndash; 12:00pm

Key Responsibilities


	Receive and process cash transactions accurately.
	Issue receipts, refunds, and payment vouchers as required.
	Maintain accurate daily records of all financial transactions.
	Reconcile daily cash collections with sales and prepare summary reports.
	Deposit cash into designated bank accounts promptly.
	Monitor and account for petty cash usage.
	Support the finance team in preparing weekly and monthly reports.
	Ensure compliance with internal control procedures.
	Maintain confidentiality and integrity in all financial dealings.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in a cashier, teller, or similar finance role.
	Strong numerical and reconciliation skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and basic accounting software.
	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
	High level of integrity, reliability, and attention to detail.
	Must reside in Enugu.


Compensation


	Salary:&nbsp;N150,000 / month
	Opportunity to work in a structured manufacturing environment with room for career growth.


Method of Application

Business Development Executive Job at Biz Afric Solutions




        
    

        
        Biz Afric Solutions - Our Client is a fast-growing interior decoration business focused on transforming home and office spaces into aesthetically pleasing environments without the need for structural alterations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid – field and remote work)
Reports to: Business Owner

Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We’re looking for a proactive and organized business development executive to spearhead our business growth efforts, grow our customer base, and drive revenue growth through strategic outreach, campaigns, and partnerships.


Key Responsibilities


	Prospect and contact potential clients (homeowners, offices, Airbnb hosts).
	Build relationships with real estate agents, developers, and property brokers to generate leads.
	Maintain and update a database of prospects and actively follow up on inquiries.
	Develop and manage a structured referral system for past clients and partners.
	Track and process referral rewards (commission tiers 10–20%)
	Email Marketing: Design and send weekly newsletters showcasing project transformations, promotions, and client testimonials
	Social Media: Create and post engaging content (before/after photos, trends, design tips) across Instagram, Facebook, and Pinterest.
	Paid Ads: Run Facebook/Instagram ad campaigns and optimise performance for ROI.
	SEO & Google My Business: Manage listings and ensure content is optimised for local search visibility.
	Build a segmented contact list and send bulk SMS messages monthly for offers, project features, or event promos.
	Maintain and update the business’s design portfolio for online use and client presentations
	Collect testimonials and turn successful projects into short case studies for marketin
	Identify and attend relevant expos, home & lifestyle fairs, or networking events.
	Establish collaboration with furniture stores, interior accessory vendors, and property developers.
	Represent the brand at in-person events, promoting services and generating leads.


Success in This Role Looks Like


	Consistently generating quality leads and converting them into paying clients.
	Increasing our online engagement and social media reach.
	Building a pipeline of partnerships that feed consistent business.
	Helping the business hit its ?1M monthly revenue target within 6 months.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field.
	1 - 2 years of experience in digital marketing, field marketing, or client acquisition roles.
	Proficiency in digital tools: Canva, Mailchimp (or similar), Meta Business Suite, Excel/Google Sheets.
	Strong verbal and written communication skills.
	Confidence in attending events and engaging with clients in person.
	Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.
	Interest in interior design or lifestyle branding is a plus.


Perks


	Salary: N140,000 - N180,000 monthly (with commissions)
	Opportunity to grow within a creative and expanding company.
	Hands-on exposure to both digital and offline marketing techniques.
	Bonuses based on performance and results.
